page.title: 11THE WESTERN LANGUAGE CENTRE
page.content: The{Western Language Centre}had been a farm, then a doctor's surgery and finally a library for books on the war before it became a language school. 35 qualified teachers work at the school and six languages are taught:{English, {French, German, Italian, Spanish and {Portuguese.}Students of 11 nations come to study here. The courses are normally from 1 - 16 weeks long for private students and groups. The students stay with host families or in Hotels. The students are all in technical or managerial jobs and industrial visits are included in the study programme. For relaxation and variety, the school organises theatre visits, tourist trips, folk singing, pub visits, parties and sports.
